root.name: Astropop
root.description: OverviewThe game consists of 32 levels and four different characters, each with their unique "Supa" weapon that can be used to clear a large amount of bricks to get you out of a bind.You only have a single life, but checkpoints will help you along the way so you don't have to start over from scratch each time. Bonus levels appear, sporting a puzzle for you to solve for some extra points towards your high score.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XPProcessor: Pentium 2 @ 350 MHzMemory: 128 MBVideo Memory: SVGASound Card: DirectX CompatibleDirectX: 7.0
